title: Job 18:1
text: THEN answered Bildad the Shuhite, and said,

title: Job 18:2
text: How long will it be ere ye make an end of words?  mark, and afterwards we will speak.

title: Job 18:3
text: Wherefore are we counted as beasts, and reputed vile in your sight?

title: Job 18:4
text: He teareth himself in his anger: shall the earth be forsaken for thee?  and shall the rock be removed out of his place?

title: Job 18:5
text: Yea, the light of the wicked shall be put out, and the spark of his fire shall not shine.

title: Job 18:6
text: The light shall be dark in his tabernacle, and his candle shall be put out with him.

title: Job 18:7
text: The steps of his strength shall be straitened, and his own counsel shall cast him down.

title: Job 18:8
text: For he is cast into a net by his own feet, and he walketh upon a snare.

title: Job 18:9
text: The gin shall take him by the heel, and the robber shall prevail against him.

title: Job 18:10
text: The snare is laid for him in the ground, and a trap for him in the way.

title: Job 18:11
text: Terrors shall make him afraid on every side, and shall drive him to his feet.

title: Job 18:12
text: His strength shall be hungerbitten, and destruction shall be ready at his side.

title: Job 18:13
text: It shall devour the strength of his skin: even the firstborn of death shall devour his strength.

title: Job 18:14
text: His confidence shall be rooted out of his tabernacle, and it shall bring him to the king of terrors.

title: Job 18:15
text: It shall dwell in his tabernacle, because it is none of his: brimstone shall be scattered upon his habitation.

title: Job 18:16
text: His roots shall be dried up beneath, and above shall his branch be cut off.

title: Job 18:17
text: His remembrance shall perish from the earth, and he shall have no name in the street.

title: Job 18:18
text: He shall be driven from light into darkness, and chased out of the world.

title: Job 18:19
text: He shall neither have son nor nephew among his people, nor any remaining in his dwellings.

title: Job 18:20
text: They that come after him shall be astonied at his day, as they that went before were affrighted.

title: Job 18:21
text: Surely such are the dwellings of the wicked, and this is the place of him that knoweth not God.
